captions.text: For three years I searched for the house he built.
I knew it had to be out there.
I'm Jack Harper as well and I am home also.
I'm home and i'm Jack Harper.
Hey, I'm Jack. I'm home now.
I'm Jack, this is my home.
Harper, Jack home. Jack is home.
Hey, did you have that baby all by yourself?
I'm Jack Harper... I'm Jack Harper... I'm Jack Harper.

Oh and we also all come with an angry
Victoria.
Is that gonna be a problem?

comments.text:
O well, the movie ending made sense in the way it was explained. 
Considering the tom cruise that comes home at the end, is the only other 
clone to have interacted with the main tom cruise, and as a result, 
question his actions and remember his past. The explosion thing.. from what 
i remember, the big object wanted what was on tom cruise's ship, so it 
wouldn't have blown him off right away. It could have been handled by an 
escort ship, and not be allowed inside until it's contents where checked, 
like it would normally happen in a scenario like that.﻿
